chat_client

Class Protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat_client.Protocol

  • public class Protocol
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is represents a protocol for the messages that server and client send and receive.
    Also it parses a receiving messages and creats messages to send
    All methods of this class are static

      Setting the result message from "connectRequest" message.

                                             java.lang.String from,
                                             java.lang.String message)
        Creates a new message to send either to the server or to client.
        Parameters:
        type - the tyep of the sending message.
        from - from whom sent the message (username).

      • setResultFromServer

        public static void setResultFromServer(java.lang.String[] ParsedMessage,
                                       java.lang.String answer)
        Setting the result message from "connectRequest" message.
        The answer can be success when the connection established successfully
        or fail when the requested username is in use by other user.
        Parameters:
        ParsedMessage -
        answer - The answer from the server

      • parseMessage

        public static java.lang.String[] parseMessage(java.lang.String message)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns an array of answers.
